title: Malzahart
body: Ma la passiva di{{champion:90}} vale come spells o auto attack?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Zedant,realm=EUW,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=2cEFa2Wb,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-05T15:59:39.713+0000)
>
> lo so..

Ah ma quindi parli dei voidling? Non sei stato chiaro...

Comunque i voidling sono considerati pet, come l'orso di annie
ho chiesto se valevano come spells o auto attack i loro attacchi.

Voidlings are autonomous minions that attack nearby enemy units.

    Voidlings have a leash range of 1700
    Voidlings are classified as a minion for targeting purposes.
    The Voidlings' attacks do not apply spell effects.
        This is with the exception of Rylai's Crystal Scepter item.png Rylai's Crystal Scepter, which will apply a 20% Slow icon slow for 1 second whenever they attack, as it is specifically allows pets to apply the slow. 
    The Voidlings' attacks do not apply on-hit effects.
    The Voidlings' attacks will apply The Black Cleaver item.png The Black Cleaver stacks.
    The Voidlings' attacks can be Riposte.png parried and Aegis Protection.png blocked and will miss if they are blinded.
    The "Voidlings" attacks CAN'T be Counter Strike.png dodged.
    Voidlings gain bonuses to their attack damage, armor and attack speed as they last out on the field. After 7 seconds, they gain 50% increased armor and attack damage. After 14 seconds, they gain increased attack speed.
        Attack damage after 7 seconds: 30 + (7.5 Ã— Malzahar's level) (+ 150% bonus AD)
        Armor after 7 seconds: 45
        Attack speed after 14 seconds: 1.496 
    Voidlings' attack priorities (don't conflict with each other):
        The target of Nether Grasp.png Nether Grasp
        The nearest champion affected by Malefic Visions.png Malefic Visions
        The nearest non-champion affected by Malefic Visions.png Malefic Visions
        The current target of Malzahar's basic attacks
        The nearest enemy unit. 
    Voidlings will benefit from Malzahar's armor penetration.
    Enemy turrets will prioritize Voidlings directly above the chain of melee minions.
    Possible Bug: When Malzahar dies, any active Voidlings will become idle for the rest of their lifespan. Occasionally, if Voidlings have an attack target when Malzahar dies, they will continue to chase their target - but they will not deal damage.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Malzahar
